stale

public boolean stale(PGridHost host)
In lazzy strategy (CoF), We should correct the routing table only if in the current level a certain percent of it is offline or staled.

Specified by:
stale in interface MaintenancePolicy
Overrides:
stale in class CoUPolicy
Parameters:
host - stale host
Returns:
true if the routing table has been updated
See Also:
